migration-v13-router-link-empty-expressi.description: Migrates `[routerLink]=""` in templates to `[routerLink]="[]"` because these links are likely intended to route to the current page with updated fragment/query params.

migration-v13-testbed-teardown.description: In Angular version 13, the `teardown` flag in `TestBed` will be enabled by default. This migration automatically opts out existing apps from the new teardown behavior.
